author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`. Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

  - [CMSHLT-2184](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2184): [BTV] addition of paths with DeepJet b-tagger
  - [CMSHLT-2218](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2218): [BTV] fix to `MC_CaloBTagDeepCSV` path

A customisation function is added to make these latest menus, built in `12_3_0_pre4`, work in the latest IBs. This customisation is needed after the integration of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36639, which updated, wrt `12_3_0_pre4`, the `cfi` template of a producer now used in the latest `GRun` menu.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X`
